name: Delivered
description:
You play as Jacob, Since it's summer time you have decided to start a package delivery service to earn some extra cash so you can buy your all time favourite GAMEBOY.

  • GAMEPLAY:

  Your goal is to deliver the package as quickly as possible, collect as money coins as possible but between all this don't forget to drink water. Summer is fun but it's also HOT. You need to keep drinking water in order to stay hydrated. Beware of the dogs, they may seem friendly but they will suck all your H2O in a snap.

If you fail, restart the job OR just roam around the Hot and Empty city.

P.S.: Hey I've tried to fix as many bugs as possible but if you still manage to find any, please let me know :)
